text:
@realDonaldTrump Actually they’re probably very hurt & confused considering your bigoted ignorance is pablum for your racist brethren, but HEY! That’s how to rile up your base! Make them think it’s all another culture’s fault instead of yours.
https://t.co/K0Zxjvogrf
